(Wow! All the people! Well, now I'm definitely gonna have to make one. It w=
ill take place on Cybertron's present, and I have no problems with transfer=
ring characters from NBW to NBM or back, so feel free to bring your charact=
ers, but don't abandon this great RPG!! BTW Magmatron is going to kinda tak=
e Megatron's place on Cybertron, he will get control of a large area of the=
 planet, but not all. And the forces will be Maximal, Predacon, Destron, an=
d Other)

::Magmatron::

    Upon returning to his base he decided to set u=
p some charges in the mountain to move the ship. He sent robotics teams to =
plant these bombs.
    "All Destron forces, return to base emidetally," He =
commanded. "Minor explosives will be detonating shortly, I need to be close=
r to a ocean."

(This will also give a definite place for Magmatron's lair.=
 I've also gotta make a Drake Magmatron figure, gotta get BM Megs for that)=
